item.title: EP 293 - The African Vampire War
item.itunes:title: The African Vampire War
item.description:
Today we take a pill to get all hairy, and then we travel to Malawi to outrun mobs AND vampires!

Patreon

https://www.patreon.com/user?u=18482113

MERCH STORE!!!

https://www.redbubble.com/people/deadrabbitradio/works/35749420-dead-rabbit-radio?asc=u

 

Help Promote Dead Rabbit!

Dual Flyer

https://i.imgur.com/OhuoI2v.jpg

"As Above" Flyer 

https://i.imgur.com/yobMtUp.jpg

 

Kids get 'werewolf syndrome' from taking dodgy medicine in Spain's Costa Del Sol

https://www.mirror.co.uk/news/world-news/kids-werewolf-syndrome-taking-dodgy-19018849

 

Children develop ‘werewolf syndrome’ after taking dodgy meds in Costa del Sol]

https://www.dailystar.co.uk/news/world-news/children-develop-werewolf-syndrome-after-19014094

 

What Is Alopecia Areata?

https://www.webmd.com/skin-problems-and-treatments/guide/alopecia-areata#1

 

Malawi: Nine killed and 250 arrested after mob attacks people believed to be 'vampires'

https://www.independent.co.uk/news/nine-killed-250-arrested-malawi-mob-attackers-blood-sucking-vampires-a8100256.html

 

Panic and vengeful mobs as Vampire scare rattles Malawi

https://www.nation.co.ke/news/africa/Vampire-scare-rattles-Malawi/1066-4214900-fbv1yez/index.html

 

Malawi cracks down on 'vampire' lynch mobs

https://www.bbc.com/news/world-africa-41692944

 

How Colonialism Fueled Deadly Anti-Vampire Hysteria in Malawi

https://www.vice.com/en_us/article/7x4kjg/how-colonialism-fueled-deadly-anti-vampire-hysteria-in-malawi

 

Climate change is creating vampires in Malawi

https://www.asiabyafrica.com/point-a-to-a/climate-change-vampires-in-africa-malawi

 

Listen to the daily podcast anywhere you listen to podcasts!

------------------------------------------------

Logo Art By Ash Black

 

"As Above" Art By Grant Scott

 

Dead Rabbit Skull By John from the SCAR Group

 

Opening Song: "Atlantis Attacks"

Closing Song: "Bella Royale"

Music By Dr. Huxxxtable

Rabbitron 3000 created by Eerbud

Thanks to Chris K, Founder Of The Golden Rabbit Brigade

 

http://www.DeadRabbit.com

Email: DeadRabbitRadio@gmail.com

Twitter: @DeadRabbitRadio

Facebook: www.Facebook.com/DeadRabbitRadio

 

Paranormal, Conspiracy, and True Crime news as it happens! Jason Carpenter breaks the stories they'll be talking about tomorrow, assuming the world doesn't end today.

 

All Contents Of This Podcast Copyright Jason Carpenter 2018 - 2019
